front.title: Using the IPv6 Flow Label for Performance Measurement with Alternate Marking Method in Segment Routing

abstract.t: [RFC6294] makes a survey of Proposed Use Cases for the IPv6 Flow Label. The IPv6 protocol includes a flow label in every packet header, but this field is not used in practice. This document describes how the alternate marking method can be used as the passive performance measurement method in a IPv6 domain.
